item.description: This will be a wonderful free music concert by Persian, Turkish and Chinese ensembles/Duet on Saturday night.  String instruments such as Oud, Kamanche, Setar, Saz, Pipa, and Guzheng will be played with some improvisations and drums.  The musicians are: Nima Janmohammadi, Shadi Ebrahimi, Hamed Tabkhi, Turgay Erturk, Shin-Yi Yang and Kevin Zhen.  Please check http://www.acansrs.org/index.html for details.  The auditorium holds seats for about 150 people.  Parking (meter/street) maybe available around Harvard (Cambridge St./Kirkland St./Oxford St.). Only a short 6 min. walk from Harvard Sq T (Red Line) - walk across the Yard. Meetup people may sign up at the entrance as such and sit on the left side of the stage, if possible. Now there will be a designated area for Meet-up folks. Also there will be light refreshment afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: Yenching Auditorium on the first floor near the entrance of Yenching Institute
item.name: Silk Road Music Concert at Harvard Yenching Auditorium
